warningBanner:
Dear Valued Customer,
We are currently updating our payment integration system, and as a result, new top-up transactions are temporarily on hold. We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and appreciate your patience during this process.
For further assistance or inquiries, please reach out to our support team.

howActiveGoogle.title: How to activate account linking with ConvetedPay?
howActiveGoogle.step1: 1. You will receive an email with the subject “You have a pending request to link your account to a Manager account (Convertedin - PT)”
howActiveGoogle.step2: 2. Click on the button “Manage Linking Invitation”
howActiveGoogle.step3: 3. You will be redirected to Link Request Page, Click on “Accept” action.
howActiveGoogle.footerText: If you didn’t receive the email, please

paymentInfoBanner.title:
Thanks for charging through ConvertedPay.
If this is the 1st time to charge, please follow the following steps so that we can transfer the amount to your google account:
items: Go to your google registered email and check the inbox (Invitation will be sent to give ConvertedPay access)
Please press on accepting invitation then grant us access to your billing profile
Also you can view the video below for more clarification: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d-2rWXr6STM

account.refundPolicyDescription: We're committed to providing a smooth and secure experience. Your balance will remain in your account and can be used whenever you need it. Refunds will only be processed for genuine issues, and we appreciate your understanding and cooperation.
account.infoBanner: Please note the {{currency}} accounts only can be connected.
account.googlePromoNotice:
Important Notice: Promotional Credits Expiration

If you proceed with a Billing Transfer (such as changing account ownership or connecting to ConvertedPay), any active promotional credits provided by Google will be lost.

🔹 Promotional credits will NOT transfer, be refunded, or reactivated.
🔹 Once the transfer is completed, the credits will expire permanently.
🔹 You can still view past promotions under your previous billing setup via Billing Transfers > Promotions.

✅ Please review your promotional credits before proceeding.
❌ This action is irreversible once completed.

referral.title: Referral
referral.subtitle: Get Free Credit
referral.referralEarningsDescription: Referral users receive free ad credits when a referred user completes their first charge. Use these credits to fund your ad campaigns and boost your reach!
referral.remainingEarningsDescription: Available earnings to charge your social accounts with
referral.shareReferralCodeDescription: Share your referral code with your friends and once they registered and charge their accounts, you will get your free credit
referral.getYourReferralLink: Get your referral link and share it with your friends
referral.step1: Copy your referral code and share it with your friends
referral.step2: Your friend will create his account and charge it for the first time.
referral.step3: Get your free credit “{{value}} {{currency}}” and use it to charge your social account.
